FuncDef:
The ntp sync-interval command sets the time interval at which the client clock is updated.
The undo ntp sync-interval command deletes the interval period. The ntp sync-interval command sets the time interval at which the client clock is updated. The undo ntp sync-interval command deletes the interval period. By default, the time interval for updating the client clock is not set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the time interval for updating a clock.
The value is an integer ranging from 180 to 600 seconds.

ExtraInfo: To set the interval at which the client clock is updated, run this command.
